alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins; Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 04 at 2:42PM CST until January 04 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...In Kansas, Cheyenne, Rawlins, Sherman and Thomas Counties. In Colorado, Yuma and Kit Carson Counties. In Nebraska, Dundy and Hitchcock Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust is also possible causing reductions in visibility. Air quality may become poor.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
